title: Prepare for a Regulatory Inspection
description: A quality manager is notified of an upcoming FDA inspection and must prepare the site.

tasks.description: Assemble a list of documents likely to be requested by the inspector (e.g., quality manual, key SOPs, recent investigation reports).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a comprehensive document request list.

tasks.description: Gather all requested documents and stage them in a designated 'front room' for the inspector.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates all documents and organizes them for easy access.

tasks.description: Assign roles for the inspection, such as scribe, runner, and SME liaison.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and distributes an inspection roles and responsibilities sheet.

tasks.description: Conduct a mock inspection to prepare the staff.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a practice session, asking common inspector questions and reviewing staff responses.
